main event: A round, bright golden object was observed hovering in Amarillo, Texas for approximately one and a half hours on May 22, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a pea held at arm's length., It was observed while the observer was taxiing a lawn., The object appeared stationary for about 20 minutes after moving slightly., The sighting was made during a time with broken clouds and thunderstorms nearby., The report concluded that the sighting was caused by a weather balloon.
